Package com.brightcove.player.mediacontroller

Class BrightcoveControlBar

java.lang.Object
android.view.View
android.view.ViewGroup
android.widget.LinearLayout
com.brightcove.player.mediacontroller.BrightcoveControlBar
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent
public class BrightcoveControlBar extends android.widget.LinearLayout
Provides a control bar wrapper class. The control bar is merely a linear layout instance containing the player controls. Its main raison d'etre is to provide access to layout defined attributes.

  • Method Details

    • getBooleanResource

      public boolean getBooleanResource(int index)
      Access a given boolean attribute by Android styleable resource index. The default if the index is invalid is false.
      Parameters:
      index - The Android styleable resource index for the desired boolean resource.

    • getColorResource

      public int getColorResource(int index, int defaultValue)
      Access a given color attribute by Android styleable resource index. The default if the index is invalid is yellow for android tv, or white otherwise.
      Parameters:
      index - The Android styleable resource index for the desired boolean resource.
      defaultValue - The color to use by default.

    • getImage

      public android.graphics.drawable.Drawable getImage(int key)
      Access an optional image for a given key.
      Parameters:
      key - The map key used to accesss a customer provided image to overide the associated default button icon face.
      Returns:
      null if there is no customer defined image for the given key, the drawable image otherwise.

    • getResourceId

      public int getResourceId(int index)
      Access a given resource identifier attribute by Android styleable resource index.
      Parameters:
      index - The Android styleable index for the desired attribute.

    • getFloatResource

      Access a given float attribute by Android styleable resource index.
      Parameters:
      index - The Android styleable index for the desired float attribute.
      defaultValue - The default value to use when the index is invalid.
